title: I'm a Fashion Editor—These Are the Memorial Day Sales That Matter
description: Including Nordstrom, Ssense, Shopbop, and more.
author: Audry Hiaoui
excerpt: Including Nordstrom, Ssense, Shopbop, and more.
text: Whether you're halfway around the world on a lavish vacation or embracing doing nothing at home this long weekend, one thing's certain: Memorial Day sales are everywhere.I just spent way too long scrolling through the noise, and I found so many discounts. For example, designer from Ssense, summer staples from Gap, suncare from Ulta—the list goes on and on. There's a Balenciaga bag I'm genuinely shocked is on sale, Repetto heels I've been eyeing for years, Miaou capris that are so chic, and EltaMD's cult-favorite sunscreen—to name a few.Whether you're shopping specifically for the season ahead, restocking your beauty products, or just browsing for fun, here are the Memorial Day sales worth knowing.NordstromDate: Through June 1Sale Info: The Nordstrom Half-Yearly Sale includes discounts on a range of brands. Repetto Black Camille Heels I've been wanting these Repetto shoes for so long. J.Crew Cap-Sleeve Midi Dress This dress reminds me of Doên. J.Crew Side-Tie Skirt in Ramie I might get this side-tie skirt. Paula's Choice Skin Perfecting 2% BHA Liquid Salicylic Acid Exfoliant I recently started using this toner. medicube Zero Pore Pads 2.0 TikTok's favorite exfoliating pads. html:
Whether you're halfway around the world on a lavish vacation or embracing doing nothing at home this long weekend, one thing's certain: Memorial Day sales are everywhere.

I just spent way too long scrolling through the noise, and I found so many discounts. For example, designer from Ssense, summer staples from Gap, suncare from Ulta—the list goes on and on. There's a Balenciaga bag I'm genuinely shocked is on sale, Repetto heels I've been eyeing for years, Miaou capris that are so chic, and EltaMD's cult-favorite sunscreen—to name a few.

Whether you're shopping specifically for the season ahead, restocking your beauty products, or just browsing for fun, here are the Memorial Day sales worth knowing.

Nordstrom

Date: Through June 1

Sale Info: The Nordstrom Half-Yearly Sale includes discounts on a range of brands.

Balenciaga

Mini Neo Cagole Metallic Leather Tote

Simone Rocha

Negligee Bow Slipdress

The sweetest Simone Rocha slip.

Justine Clenquet

Sam Hoop Earrings

My friend has these exact Justine Clenquet earrings.

Steve Madden

Cary Heeled Sandal

These kitten heels are so good.

Ssense

Date: Through May 26

Sale Info: Up to 50% off.

MargeSherwood

Black Outpocket Bag

Aeyde

Black Wilma Leather Toe-Post Heeled Sandals

Vivienne Westwood

Black Granny Frame Bag

Vivienne Westwood forever.

Repetto

Black Camille Heels

I've been wanting these Repetto shoes for so long.

Shopbop

Date: Through May 27

Sale Info: Up to 50% off designer must-haves, plus for three days only get an extra 10% off all sale styles with code EXTRA10.

Shopbop

Miaou Emma Capris

Proenza Schouler

Large Ruched Tote

60% off a Proenza Schouler bag.

Pixie Market

Smocked Strapless Dress

I really like this paprika color.

Frankies Bikinis

Christabelle Gauze Dress

I always like to check if Frankies Bikinis is on sale.

J.Crew

Date: Through May 27

Sale Info: Shop up to 50% off 1000s of styles & 50% off select swim.

J.Crew

Cropped Fine Rib Scoopneck Tank Top

J.Crew has so many basics on sale right now.

J.Crew

Contrast-Stitch Midi Skirt in Cotton Poplin

Cotton midis get so much wear.

J.Crew

Cap-Sleeve Midi Dress

This dress reminds me of Doên.

J.Crew

Side-Tie Skirt in Ramie

I might get this side-tie skirt.

Gap

Date: Through May 27

Sale Info: Shop 40–60% select styles, including 50% off all shorts & tees.

Gap

Cotton Gauze Mixed Media Maxi Dress

Such a perfect summer dress.

Gap

Drop-Waist Maxi Dress

I can't stop talking about drop-waist dresses.

I'll definitely be stocking up on Gap's bikinis and thongs.

Gap

Modern Rib Halter Tank Top

Tons of everyday pieces are on sale.

Ulta Beauty

Date: Through May 26

Sale Info: Buy one, get one 50% off.

Vacation

Vacation by Vacation Eau De Toilette

This is one of my go-to fragrances for summer.

Vacation

Grand Cuvée by Vacation Eau De Toilette

Would love to smell this one too.

Vacation

Orange Gelée Spray Oil Spf 30

Vacation makes the best products for beach trips.

Vacation

Classic Lotion Spf 50 Sunscreen

A classic body sunscreen.

COS

Date: Through May 26

Sale Info: 30% off select full priced styles with code MDW30.

COS

Pleated Linen Maxi Dress

Everything from Cos always feels elevated.

COS

Front-Pleat Mini Skirt

This front-pleat mini skirt is cute.

COS

Bias-Cut Maxi Slip Dress

COS

Corset-Detail Maxi Dress

Blue Mercury

Date: Through May 26

Sale Info: Up to 25% off summer essentials.

Laura Mercier

Tinted Moisturizer Oil Free Broad Spectrum Spf 20

You won't find me ever wearing foundation in the summer.

EltaMD

Uv Clear Tinted Broad-Spectrum Facial Sunscreen Spf 46

The deeply beloved sunscreen.

Supergoop!

(re)setting Refreshing Mist Spf 40

A mist to top up throughout the day.

Amazon

Date: Through May 26

Sale Info: Sales across shoes, accessories, clothing, beauty, and wellness.

Paula's Choice

Skin Perfecting 2% BHA Liquid Salicylic Acid Exfoliant

I recently started using this toner.

medicube

Zero Pore Pads 2.0

TikTok's favorite exfoliating pads.

Abercrombie & Fitch

Date: Through May 26

Sale Info: 25% off everything & extra 15% off with promo code AFSUMMER.

abercrombie

The A&F Ava Top

abercrombie

The A&F Scarlett Linen-Blend Mini Skort

abercrombie

Linen-Blend Beaded Cami

The beaded detail makes this look way more expensive.

V-Neck Linen-Blend Mini Dress

I want this little black dress.

Walmart

Date: Through May 26

Sale Info: Various discounts across the entire site.

Scoop

Mixed Fabric Maxi Dress

The piece to wear during warm weather.

Athletic Works

Tennis Dress

Tennis dresses are my ideal workout clothes.

Dyson

Restored Premium Dyson Airwrap

At the end of the day, I want a Dyson.

Scoop

Asymmetrical Maxi Dress

Express

Date: Through May 26

Sale Info: 50% off select styles.

Express

Mock Cowl Neck Sleeveless Mini Dress

Mock necks are always elegant.

Express

Sleeveless Ruched Midi Fit and Flare Dress

Express

One Shoulder Sweater Tank

Ever since the weather warmed up, I can't stop wearing a one shoulder top with a midi skirt.

Express

Ribbed Scoop Neck Sleeveless Maxi Sweater Dress
